alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 09 at 8:01AM CST until November 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow, mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with potential for small areas of higher amounts and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty remains for the areas that could receive the heaviest snow and timing and coverage of freezing rain or sleet. This will create large spread in potential impacts, and the storm track could still shift.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau
